column1: Little Goat Diner////Fried Pickles and Onion Rings - were... fried pickles and onion rings - how can you go wrong with this one? Unfortunately
column2: we didn't get to eat this dish right after it was prepared as it was delivered to us right before we were about to leave
column3: but even as we ate them later on
column5: they were good! They are served with curry mayo and ranch - which I loved.  I love onion rings and my partner loves pickles so it was kind of a must get in our books.  Maybe it wasn't the best combination with our breakfast choices
